nodes.text: A unisuit was regulation uniform worn by workers of various types.
A gray-blue unisuit, for example, was worn by miners of the Home Planet Mine on the planet Bandomeer; even high-ranking company officials such as VeerTa wore the unisuit.

On the booming industry planet of Falleen, a red unisuit was worn by workers at the Blackwater Systems facility on the outskirts of the capital city of Falleen Throne. In 24 BBY, undercover Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker wore unisuits at the factory while investigating its possible ties to arch-enemy of the Jedi Order, Force Blank Granta Omega.
